SkillProficiencyFeature.Name: Lore of the Waters
SkillProficiencyFeature.Text: You gain proficiency in History and Nature.

BonusSpellKeywordChoiceFeature.Name: Cantrip
BonusSpellKeywordChoiceFeature.Text: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

SubRace.Name: Blue Merfolk
SubRace.Description: Blue merfolk often have burgundy or magenta on their faces and chests, with lighter shades of blue and purple elsewhere. Their eyes are red, orange, or blue, and their long, thin, and elegant fins resemble scarves or veils of fine fabric. They swim easily, even upstream, and clamber over rocks and through rapids with ease. They prefer to dwell in shallow waters, but spend a fair amount of time on land as well.
